quote: Hope and fear come from feeling that we lack something; they come from a sense of poverty. – Pema Chodron
fact: The 57 on the Heinz ketchup bottle represents the number of pickle types the company once had.
joke: Did you hear about the new restaurant on the moon? The food is great, but there’s just no atmosphere.
